Reviews.Title: I Love it
Reviews.Author: Dennis
Reviews.Content: actually it is no better way to have a great time on woorking with a great device. Nokia done her best and made a greate tablet with a LTe on board. Perfect for Europe.Thank you.Es besteht kein Zweifel daran, dass das ist das Beste von Nokia.Ois Perfect. :)

Reviews.Title: Nokia and microsoft make qa great team.
Reviews.Author: saun
Reviews.Content: Yes indeed it has a super camera.Crystal clear keeping in line with Nokias tradition.The 4Glte works great  and the Microsoft apps a super bonus.I would rate it better than some of the other hifi profile tablets in the market as it has a great processor.The wifi works great.Overall  a bit expensive but good tablet

Reviews.Title: promotion is lacking
Reviews.Author: alikanan
Reviews.Content: Nokia should come out with its power board asap to promote the tablet or else it will face the fate of its Microsoft counterpart
